name: Maingron Zelda Demo
description:
Maingron Zelda is a game I was developing. I try to make it look and feel like The Legend Of Zelda: Links Awakening. This now has become a demo since the engine is not very optimized. There will be another version in the future.

To learn more about Maingron Zelda, visit https://maingron.com/maingron_zelda

Controls:

[ESC]: Opens the menu; Then walk around in the menu
[W, A, S, D]: Move your character
[C]: Activates noclip
[E]: Interact

Keep in mind that this is just a demo / tech preview.
